title: Kansas City IL and AL Facilities

properties.name: Aberdeen Village IL/AL/SNF
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid17500 West 119th Street Olathe, KSAberdeen Village A retirement community of distinction in Olathe, Kansas Ask our residents and each one will have a different opinion about what makes Aberdeen Village retirement community special. Whether it’s joining friends for a night at the Royals baseball game, or enjoying the Cappucino Bar in a leisurely start to the morning, the features, on-site conveniences and ambiance of Aberdeen Village are the way you want to live. Take a dip in the pool, keep up your youthful figure in the Fitness Center, or take advantage of the many cultural and sports events that the Kansas City area has to offer. We have plenty happening at the Village in addition to taking advantage of this metropolitan area’s attractions. You’ll find everything you need to truly enjoy the freedom that comes with retirement community living. Residents are always inviting friends to join them for a meal at our Village Green Restaurant. Our wait staff serve delectable meals from the menu, which is always changing. You’ll find apartment home plans from one-bedroom to a two-bedroom grand with plenty of space for you and when the grandchildren visit. While Aberdeen Village opened in 2001, we have filled quickly with a limited number of apartment homes now available. Your entrance deposit holds your apartment home, now or for the future. As a complete retirement community, residents appreciate that should their needs change, assisted living and the health care center are here on our 35-acre campus. We invite you to take a virtual visit, then be sure to see this distinctive retirement community for yourself.

properties.name: Bishop Spencer Place IL/AL/SNF
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid4301 Madison Ave Kansas City, MO 64111Life is full of new beginnings. And choosing where to live in retirement is one of them. At Bishop Spencer Place, you’ll thrive, energized by the cultural activities and conveniences Kansas City has to offer, just minutes from your front door. You can also relax, knowing you’ve chosen a lovely, vibrant community that’s expanding to include spacious apartments and new amenities. Plus, as a Continuing Care Retirement Community, we offer all levels of care, from total independence to Coventry Count assisted living to York Place health center for those who require a higher degree of skilled nursing care. Bishop Spencer Place is closely affiliated with the Episcopal Diocese of West Missouri and is privileged to be part of the Saint Luke’s Hospital network of providers. Opportunity. Independence. Friendships. Health. Life is full of new beginnings…and choices. Make yours Bishop Spencer Place.

properties.name: Carnegie Village IL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid107 Bernard Drive Belton, MO 64012Welcome to Carnegie Village, adult and retirement living at its finest. This fully gated community provides maintenance and worry free living for seniors age 55 and older. Our community is designed for you to maintain your independent lifestyle and be as active or as quiet as you like, with the knowledge that you are in the care of a staff that is fully devoted to your comfort. Carnegie Village is a beautiful brick building overlooking Belton Memorial Park and the surrounding community. It is built of the highest quality and staffed with experienced people. All the services you need are available on the premises. This self contained community is truly adult and retirement living at its finest. Located within ½ mile in the heart of Belton’s fastest growing area you will find local businesses such as: Target Home Depot HyVee Grocery Store Kohl’s Dept Store Belton Theater Post Office Ruby Tuesdays Longhorn Steakhouse Jose Peppers Bob Evan’s Restaurant Eckerd Drug Store Walgreens Drug Store If you would like to take in some of the local attractions, Belton is located only minutes from the finest social and recreational facilities that Kansas City has to offer. These include: The Kansas City Royals Baseball Club The Kansas City Chiefs Football Team The symphony The ballet Several theatres Variety of river boats The renowned Plaza Hallmark’s Crown Center Bartle Hall Kemper Arena Here at Carnegie Village in Belton, you can enjoy the charm of a small town and have all the amenities of the big city only minutes away.

properties.name: Cedar Lake Village IL/AL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid15325 South Loone Elm Road olathe, KS 66061The trust and capability of Olathe Medical Center joined with the comfort and caring of the Evangelical Lutheran Good Samaritan Society: The result is a senior living retirement community like no other. It is called Cedar Lake Village. Near scenic Cedar Lake on the Olathe Medical Center campus, Cedar Lake Village offers new choices in senior living. For active, independent seniors, there is the 48-unit congregate housing complex. Providing some supportive services, the congregate units offer residents the benefits of independence and freedom, combined with the security of community living. A higher level of care is offered in Cedar Lake Village\'s 36 assisted-living units. These combine housing with supportive services for seniors wanting personalized attention but not requiring traditional 24-hour skilled nursing care. Both choices share an important commonality: The atmosphere of warmth, caring and Christ-centered living that is the hallmark value of The Good Samaritan Society. With Olathe Medical Center literally right next door, peace of mind is simply a given. We invite you to learn more about the unique opportunities open to you at Cedar Lake Village. Please call 913-780-9916 to arrange a personal consultation and tour.

properties.name: Freedom Pointe AL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid9201 Foster Overland Park, KS 66212Not just Assisted Living, Better Living Freedom Pointe Overland Park is a senior community designed to help those who need assistance with daily activities such as bathing, dressing and administering needed medication. Just like family, we provide the extra assistance you may need with your daily activities, while helping you maintain the privacy, dignity and independence that means so much to you. And we do it all in a family-centered environment where loved ones are encouraged to be as involved as possible. Through consultation with you, and through regular life profiling we ensure that you will receive just the right amount of care for your needs. At Homewood you will be served by an exceptional, dedicated and caring professional staff who genuinely love what they do. And it shows. As a resident, you\'ll enjoy a friendly environment where common living areas, an inviting dining room and a warm kitchen naturally draw people together. In your beautiful apartment, you will enjoy all the comforts of home. And with the addition of your personal furniture and cherished possessions, it\'s sure to be an even brighter place. You will enjoy three home-style meals a day and may take part in as many of our social and recreational activities as you choose. The fact is, whether sharing delicious meals with friends and family, taking advantage of the many wonderful activities available, or simply relaxing in the privacy of your apartment, the lifestyle at Freedom Pointe offers everything you need to get the very best out of life. We invite you to discover how we\'re putting our experience to work in ways that make the whole family feel better. Alzheimer\'s/Dementia Care During one of life\'s most challenging times, it can be comforting to know that your loved one can be in the best possible hands. That\'s the peace of mind you enjoy through The Arbors Alzheimer\'s Residence. Drawing on American Retirement Corporation\'s long experience, we have created The Arbors to provide the most appropriate setting to nurture each resident physically, socially, and emotionally. Through careful design and an experienced, professional staff, The Arbors provides stimulation, stability, structure and security-all in a soothing environment that preserves the warmth, dignity, comfort and feelings of home. Thoughtful features such as "memory boxes" of personal photographs and small items outside each apartment help residents find their way and hold onto precious memories. Meanwhile, in tailoring our services, we take the time to learn-and preserve-your loved one\'s time-honored routines and preferences. At The Arbors, we treat your loved one not as a patient but as the unique individual you\'ve always known. Freedom Pointe Overland Park is owned and operated by American Retirement Corporation (ARC). Founded in 1978, ARC is committed to the principle that well-planned and well-managed senior living communities offer the best setting within which to meet the physical, mental and social needs of a large and growing segment of contemporary society. This operating philosophy was inspired by ARC\'s cofounder, Dr. Thomas Frist, Sr.\'s vision: to enhance the lives of the elderly by providing the highest quality care and services in well-operated communities designed to improve and protect the quality of life, independence, personal freedom, privacy, spirit and dignity of their residents.

properties.name: Grand Court IL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid6101 West 119th St Overland park, KS 66209The beautiful, well-manicured grounds of Grand Court provide a lovely setting for this exceptional senior living community. Ideally located on 119th Street in Overland Park, we’re directly across from Sprint World Headquarters and within walking distance of Town Center Plaza. If you love the idea of our convenient location, you’ll love the convenience and comfort Grand Court brings home to you. Celebrate a special occasion, such as a birthday or anniversary, in our elegant private dining room or join friends in our stately billiard room for a friendly game of pool. You can even do all of your banking in our on-site banking facilities. And our elegant, restaurant-style dining with a full complement of menu choices will please even the most discerning palettes. Our friendly staff has one goal – to serve our residents. At Grand Court, we make your interests and needs our No. 1 priority. Levels of service available at Grand Court Overland Park: Independent Living

properties.name: Presbyterian Manor IL/AL/SNF
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid7850 Freeman, Kansas City, KSKansas City Presbyterian Manor Voted number one adult care home by Kansas City Kansan\'s readers Kansas City Presbyterian Manor is a not – for – profit retirement community that serves a diverse population with primarily health care and memory care services. A limited number of assisted living apartments are also part of our Manor community, situated in a park like 7 acres in Kansas City, Kansas. For 35 years, the Kansas City Manor has been there for those who needed us most and for those who simply wanted the peace of mind that the Manor\'s reputation provides. It was a nice surprise this past year, when readers of Kansas City Kansan\'s newspaper, voted Kansas City Presbyterian Manor as the best choice for those in need of health center services. While our health care center is the area of care often called a "nursing home," we are not what you would expect. Our activities program has brought the residents to a Luau, a Manor Olympics, Mardi Gras, and many other fun and stimulating events. In addition, our Manor was recognized with a letter of Exemplary Care following our annual state regulatory survey required of Medicaid funded nursing homes, including health care centers at retirement communities. Currently under remodeling to help make care and service delivery more efficient in the resident – centered programs, we\'re all looking forward to the new look and adding to our capacity to care for residents who need our highest levels of care. Presbyterian Manors Retirement Communities Offer Services for Today and Tomorrow Most of our Presbyterian Manors of Mid – America retirement communities are what is called a continuing care retirement community or CCRC. That means whatever the future may bring, you will have access to the range of services we provide, without making a major move. What makes a Presbyterian Manor retirement community? Townhomes, cottages and apartments at our retirement communities are designed to provide you with a selection of services you choose to free up as much time as you wish. We refer to it as "independent living," but it\'s much more than that. It\'s the freedom to do what you enjoy most, without worrying about home maintenance and chores. Assisted Living provides short – term extra assistance if your physical needs change. We offer several levels of assisted living with programs and services to encourage improving independence. In the health care center, you can recuperate after surgery or we\'re here for you if there is a significant change in health conditions. We can take care of you at our highest levels of care. In several of our locations, we also provide memory care for those with Alzheimer\'s, dementia, or similar illnesses. We offer financing options for our retirement communities that help you make a move that fits your budget and desire to have funds on hand for future care needs. That\'s one of the advantages of a continuing care retirement community, should the need arise in the future, you and your family aren\'t making decisions about where you live at a time when you may be in a health crisis. Services are here on one campus.

properties.name: Shawnee Heartland AL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid16207 Midland Drive Shawnee, KS It is our mission at Shawnee Heartland Assisted Living to provide quality, cost-conscious senior housing alternatives which will preserve our residents individuality, independence and dignity throughout their aging process. Shawnee Heartland offers one and two bedroom apartments for residents to take advantage of daily assistance while still maintaining an active, fulfilling life. We\'d like the opportunity to tell you more about the services and benefits of assisted living at Shawnee Heartland. To arrange for a tour, please call Heartland Marketing at 913-248-6600. See the Difference When You Come Home to Heartland Shawnee Heartland is impressive both inside and out. The appeal of the building and grounds is apparent in the well-designed facility. The inside is equally inviting, as residents and visitors are welcomed into an environment of loving care, where kindness and caring are the everyday responses to any request.

properties.name: Sunrise of Leawood AL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid11661 Granada Road Leawood, KS 66211Step into a Sunrise Assisted Living community and you can’t help but feel at home. We stop at nothing to make your experience warm and inviting, from our homelike exterior architecture, to our comfortable community areas and choice of suites to our exceptional outdoor gardens and landscaping. Look around and you’ll notice fresh flowers throughout the residence, and you may even spot our dog or our cat. And of course, there are always the friendly smiling faces of our staff to insure that each day spent here is a welcome one.

properties.name: Tallgrass Creek IL  (Erickson Community)
properties.description: Posted by JphroidBrochure located in Kansas City Competition File Tallgrass Creek, a dynamic new community coming to Overland Park, Kansas will provide amenity-rich, full-service retirement living where you can Live Better. Slated to open in the fall of 2007, Tallgrass Creek will offer an unique lifestyle at an unbeatable value. With 177,832 qualified people living within 25 miles of Tallgrass Creek, the Priority Waiting List is growing each day. You’ll enjoy a “small town feel” in a community of neighbors and friends that share your interests and values, plus all the advantages and conveniences of living in Overland Park. You’ll have time to do all the things you’ve always planned to do when you no longer have to fix things around the house—your secure home at Tallgrass Creek will be completely maintenance-free and includes a lifetime home warranty. Every community building will be connected by climate-controlled walkways so the weather will never interfere with your plans. The Audubon Clubhouse offers plenty of convenient amenities so you’ll never have to go far to enjoy life to the fullest.

properties.description: Posted by Jphroid11701 Nieman Road Overland Park, KSJust North of 119th at Quivira, in the heart of Overland Park\'s acclaimed residential area, is our communities newest Assisted Living Facility. Our very residential Victorian Building (complete with turrets and old fashion porches), is home to 28 Senior Apartments, supported by a comprehensive scope of nursing and "activities of daily living" services. At the Gables you will find "Senior Care Living" at its Midwest best. So, stop by, have a glass of lemonade, and meet the "Best Care Staff" in The Greater Kansas City Area. Our Mission To enhance the residents quality of life by creating a home-like atmosphere that encourages independence, dignity and overall well-being. We are committed to a "resident first" attitude every day in every way.

properties.name: Town Village Leawood IL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid4400 West 115th Street Leawood, KSTown Village Leawood, a premiere retirement community, offers convenience not only in location, but also with our services. In addition to transportation and gated resident parking, the well-trained staff is available 24-hours a day, giving you the peace of mind you deserve to live life to the fullest. The wide array of amenities available at Town Village Leawood makes it easy to maintain an active lifestyle. Shoot a game of pool with friends, try out your green thumb in our outdoor gardening area or enjoy an exercise class with one of our certified instructors. Whatever your interests, you can rest assured that there is something else here for everyone. And with our elegant restaurant-style dining, you won\'t even want to venture out for meals! Come for the experience.....stay for the lifestyle! Town Village Leawood is owned and operated by the American Retirement Corporation (ARC). ARC is committed to the principle that well-planned and well-managed senior living communities offer the best setting within which to meet the physical, mental and social needs of a large and growing segment of contemporary society. This operating philosophy was inspired by ARC\'s cofounder, Dr. Thomas Frist, Sr.\'s vision: to enhance the lives of the elderly by providing the highest quality care and services in well-operated communities designed to improve and protect the quality of life, independence, personal freedom, privacy, spirit and dignity of their residents.

properties.name: Villa Ventura IL
properties.description: Posted by Jphroid12100 Wornall Rd, Kansas City, MOVilla Ventura is an inviting community with beautifully landscaped grounds that are an outward expression of the caring you’ll find inside. Our individual residences are attractive and bright – waiting for you to add your personal touches with your own cherished belongings. Villa Ventura’s community living areas and dining rooms welcome you to share stories and make new friends. And because everything is meticulously maintained – with housekeeping and linen service provided, you never have to worry about repairs, cleaning or yard work. Independent Living: There is a big difference between living independently – and feeling isolated. Being part of a vibrant community with on-site security and a variety of helpful services is the answer. Emergency call systems in each personal residence put our 24-hour staff at your service. Villa Ventura’s genuinely caring staff is here for you, with the services and amenities you need to feel comfortable. * Beautiful, spacious apartments * Studio, One or Two Bedrooms available * Assisted Living center * Life enrichment programs * Activities, classes and outings coordinated by Full-time Activities Director * Weekly housekeeping and ﬂat linen service * 24-hour staff * Private dining room * Continuous dining 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM * Multipurpose room with big screen TV and movie library * Community areas include; pub, ice cream parlor, billiards and arts and crafts room * Interior and exterior maintenance provided * Ample parking * Complimentary laundry facilities * On-site banking services * Scenic walking trail * Exercise room * Computer Center * Wellness clinic * Pets welcome * Beautiful non-denominational chapel * General store * Shuttle services provided for medical, entertainment and personal needs * Minutes from the Plaza Additional Services & Information * Beauty and Barber Shop located in the community * Additional apartment cleaning and personal laundry service * Personal shopping service * Guest apartment * Guest meals * Personal care services Assisted Living: Conveniently located within Villa Ventura is our own Assisted Living community where residents enjoy life with their friends and neighbors while receiving the support and assistance they need to remain independent. A Registered Nurse meets with each resident and their family to identify the resident’s needs and accommodate their preferred routine. This enables all of our residents to remain active and engaged in life. Services include: Level I * Staff on duty 24-hours a day * Weekly housekeeping, ﬂat linen service, and personal laundry * Daily assistance with medication management * Stand-by bathing assistance * Supervision of dressing and grooming * Three delicious and healthy meals daily * Stimulating activities and social events * Scheduled transportation * Interior and exterior maintenance provided * Independent heating and cooling controls Level II All Level I services plus: * Monitoring of mealtime needs such as cutting meats, completing menu * Direct personal assistance with bathing, grooming and dressing * Daytime, evening and nighttime checks of resident’s condition and whereabouts * Other monitoring and assisting services as determined by management Level III All Level II services plus: * Management of chronic urinary incontinence (including additional laundry or bathing as needed) * Other monitoring and assisting services as determined by management Additional Services and Information * Beauty and Barber Shop located in the community * Additional apartment cleaning and personal laundry service * Personal shopping service * Guest apartment Aging in Place: Villa Ventura’s Aging-in-Place Philosophy reflects our dedication to your comfort and wellbeing. Simply put, it enables you to receive the support services you need should your health circumstances change. We’re here for you, in a way that lets you remain part of your community longer. Our Aging-in-Place philosophy resonates throughout the Senior Star Living® experience: * On-going, non-medical support services that reduce physical stress and risk for injury * Round-the-clock staff available * Emergency call systems in personal residences * Discreet, integrated systems that enable staff to be alert for signs that extra care or support is needed Personal Care Program: Personal Care Program You know your changing needs better than anyone. That’s why our residents can contract individual, supportive services that maximize one’s abilities and promote health and safety – all in an environment that encourages independence. Initial assessments and supervision are provided by a Registered Nurse. With a variety of services available, we make it easy to customize the level and combination of Personal Assistance allowing you to remain as independent as possible.
